channel.title: Staff Promoting Problem
channel.description: In 508, Trying to Rank Myself Admin/Owner. i have tried it many times! i change playerrights from 0 to 2. my account get reset. Please is there any way to fix this? or which file controls the staff rights and etc...?? anyone care to help? i got team viewer!! reply back please!!!
